titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 to require States to consider measures to promote greater electrification of the transportation sector, and for other purposes.
Responsibly and Equitably Change How Auto-charging Rates Get Evaluated Act
RECHARGE Act
Responsibly and Equitably Change How Auto-charging Rates Get Evaluated Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Responsibly and Equitably Change How Auto-charging Rates Get Evaluated Act or the RECHARGE Act
This bill requires states to consider measures to promote greater electrification of the transportation sector, including the review of utility rates for charging electric vehicles.
